entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind west 20 km/h. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 36 this evening and minus 42 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 07 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 22. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h. High minus 22. Wind chill minus 39 in the morning and minus 33 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 07 January 2023
